DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate whether subject respond similarly Onset Effect Questionnaire ( OEQ ) use 1 week recall period versus 1 day recall period .
DOC.brief_title: A Two-week Study Assessing Onset Effect Questionnaire ( OEQ ) Administered Daily Versus Weekly Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male Female , > 18 year age Mild moderate asthma require treatment inhale corticosteroid Diagnosis asthma least 6 month Subjects require treatment systemic corticosteroid ( e.g. , oral , parenteral , ocular ) Subjects severe asthma , judge investigator Any significant disease disorder may jeopardize subject 's safety
